reviews.review: Worst Animated Film of all time, Too Many Product Placements in this film like YouTube, Just Dance, Candy Crush, Spotify, Facebook, Twitter, and much More, The Plot is basically ripping off films like Wreck it Ralph and Inside Out, and it will forever be the worst animated film to date, and will have a really bad repudiation to it's name.

There are plenty of bad studios that have no care for their creation at all. And if there is anything that I hate is a studio with no sense of creativity with any advantages they may have. this especially goes to studios with enough money to give decent animation. but there is one studio out there that I DESPISE not only as an animation studio, but as a complete whole of a company. that company is called Sony Pictures Animation. I hate them with every fiber of my being because they waste their talents with no care in the world of what the hell they show to the public. And yes I did say they do have but only one talent that is just its animation. but that is it. so one day those idiots announced that they would a movie that would later spawn as EVERYTHING WRONG WITH FILMAKING!!! that movie is called the emoji movie. im gonna keep this crap short because I want nothing to do with this film. but I will say that this is the worst thing possible to show to the audience. the story is something out of every movie aimed at children. it also ripped of a few films released prior such as inside out, wreck it ralph, and even the lego movie. it is just obnoxious to see such good animation waste itself ripping off better films than sony will ever make! fuck this film! fuck everything about sony! AND FUCK EMOJIS!!!!!!!!!
I was told if you don't have anything nice to say don't say anything so I won't say anything

Fairly entertaining and clever, some story ideas don't hold together, but there are a lot of creative parts. I think it might keep your interest,  okay to good commentary on today's use of cell phones. Nice visuals. Some annoying characters and stereotypes/cliches. Some parts are kind of funny.

This film is just no.
For a film wit a cast like  this you would think that it would be good but no. I feel sorry for anyone that was in this film.
Its the best movie i've ever seen

Sadly, this movie was an utter disappointment. The movie was just super stupid and pointless, with a horrible storyline, and a horrible plot. I couldnâ(TM)t make it through the entire movie because of the horrible plot. I canâ(TM)t believe Hollywood would waste money on such a disastrous production.
Bland and soulless, but forgettable and not bad enough to enrage me.  The beginning was kind of cute.  I like the old emoji scene where they were all senior citizens.  I got a laugh out of that.
I honestly didnt think it was as bad as it is made out to be.  However I feel that Disney can do it better.  Oh wait I got a lot of inside out and Ralph breaks the internet vibes.
The movie is so boring I nearly Fell asleep. I never fall asleep during movies.
